issue.title: [CI] Add integration (docker) test for turbodbc
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4356](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4356). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We regularly break our API so that `turbodbc` needs to make minor changes to support the new Arrow version. We should setup a small integration test to check before a release that `turbodbc` can easily upgrade.

It requires <https://github.com/blue-yonder/turbodbc/pull/205>, <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3980> and the adoption of the includes in turbodbc for test-util.h. For the latter I would start working on it once the version macro PR is merged.
